name: devops-ext-better-checklist
description: Devops add-on for creating and managing checklists
author: Gollmuss GmbH

scripts.compile: npm run clean && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js
scripts.compile:dev: npm run clean && webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.js
scripts.package: npm run compile && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --output-path out
scripts.package:dev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --output-path out
scripts.publish: npm run compile && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --output-path out
scripts.publish:dev: npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --output-path out
